text: Abange mmwe abakkiriza, abatali ba mu mmwe temubafuulanga ab'emikwano ab'omunda, tebayinza kulekayo kubaagaliza kabi, bulijjo babaagaliza ekyo ekibazitoowereza. Obukyayi bulabika ku mimwa gyabwe (ku nnimi zaabwe) so nga byebakweka mu bifuba byabwe byebisinga obunene, mazima tubannyonnyodde ebigambo bwe muba nga mukozesa amagezi gammwe (bibamala okutegeera ekituufu)
